summary: The Aso family live in the old town of Nara. One Day, Kei, one of the Aso's twin boys suddenly disappears. Five years later seventeen-year old Shun, the remaining twin, is an art student. ... See full summary »
cast: Kohei Fukungaga|Yuka Hyyoudo|Naomi Kawase|Katsuhisa Namase|Kanako Higuchi|Yûko Den
title: Sharasôju
